alert.note: Alert for Southeast Providence (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 29 at 3:00PM EDT until October 30 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures between 29 to 32 degrees expected. * WHERE...Southeast Providence RI County. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
